Posts.Content: Hi. Iv been ready about women who have had cysts removed.I had my first one on my left breast in 2001.in 2011 I fount a lump in my right breast after have ultrasound needle biopsy drs still didn't know what it was so I went in for surgery.thinking I had breast cancer,Dr told me he was 99% that it was cancer.lump removed result phylodies toumer.I was told it could return.2015 it returned not far from where I had it removed before mammogram showed two more lumbs that had grown from before so they needed to be removed also so 3 lumps in the same breast one was behind the nipple the other one was on the bottom side of my breast they couldn't be felt so I need to have two hook wires put into the so the Dr could find them.after opp.soreness wasn't to bad,a lot of bruising, then the major wound became full of fluid needed to be drained it also became infected. Dr had rang andcsaid that he thought he had taken enough tissue from around it but he hadn't so back I went so far so good but my scare area still gets sore and that was15 months ago
Posts.Title: breast lumps
